name: World Soccer: Winning Eleven 9
summary:
相比于前一代《实况足球8》，游戏增加了更为现实的面部表情。此外引入了雪天模式。

World Soccer: Winning Eleven 9 (Pro Evolution Soccer 5 in Europe)is a great game, and there's nothing surprising about that. What is surprising is that each year Konami deliver a game that appears to be so similar, yet feels so different to the game that preceded it. It may be as regular as clockwork, but it's no simple cash-in.
World Soccer Winning Eleven 9 brings 57 national teams, 138 licensed European club teams such as the Italian Serie A, Spanish La Liga, and the Dutch Eredivisie, and over 1,000 players to your fingertips. This title features online play for the first time in the series and is intended to unite soccer fans all over the world.

来自维基百科。
